programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Ramsay travels to the Juniper Hill Inn in Windsor, Vt., a place that's beauty is undermined by the smell of raw sewage and the owner's poor treatment of the staff.

programme.desc: Gordon returns to Spain to visit ex-nightclub owner Lawrence and his restaurant for British expats, La Parra de Burriana.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: The Fenwick Arms pub is run by landlord Brian who puts in 120 hours a week and insists on laying down the law in the kitchen.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Gordon finds a chef caught in a time warp when he tackles a largely unfrequented upmarket restaurant in King's Lynn.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Gordon tries to help Sandy with her family-run restaurant, Morgan's, near Liverpool; with an eclectic menu and a family of headstrong women to contend with, he may have bitten off more than he can chew.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Gordon comes to the aid of former actor Allan Love, whose restaurant Ruby Tates is losing money due to his lack of control and apathetic chefs.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Gordon takes on The Priory, a 100-seater carvery in Haywards Heath, Sussex; it's owned by ex-IT consultant Scott and located in a former convent, but is in need of help.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Cultures clash when Gordon heads to Paris to help a restaurant that seems to be failing due to its largely vegetarian menu.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Gordon heads to The Curry Lounge in Nottingham, a once-popular Indian restaurant run by an ex-sales director, that is bleeding £3000 a week.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Gordon helps The Granary in rural Hampshire to turn around its fortunes and make it stop losing £4,000 per week.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Gordon finds himself cast as marriage counsellor in a culinary battlefield; it's a last-ditch attempt to reverse Fish and Anchor's disastrous reputation.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Gordon attempts to help two friends save their failing restaurant from corporate competition.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Gordon attempts to help turn around a family-run bistro with hideous decor, bad food and a chef who can't face up to his mistakes.

programme.title: Helicopter ER
programme.desc: Dr. Steve launches a desperate battle to save the life of a man stabbed in a street in Sheffield.

programme.title: Helicopter ER
programme.desc: The team prepares to amputate to save a young driver trapped in his wrecked Jaguar; a boating family is overcome by carbon monoxide fumes during a river trip; aretired bobby living in an isolated Dales village is experiencing agonising chest pains.

programme.title: Helicopter ER
programme.desc: Army veteran Chris lands the helicopter in Britain's biggest garrison to reach a young boy knocked down outside married quarters.

programme.desc: Team Salvage is on a time-critical mission to retrieve a scammed derelict yacht.

programme.desc: Team Salvage is in flood-ravaged Lismore to help the owners of the town.
